bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for the Electrical Protection of Communication Facilities Serving Electric Supply Locations Through the Use of Neutralizing Transformers.
IEEE Draft Standard for the Electrical Protection of Communication Facilities Serving Electric Supply Locations Through the Use of Neutralizing Transformers.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard presents engineering design procedures for the electrical protection of communication facilities serving electric supply locations through the use of neutralizing transformers.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
